sentence.text: For one heart-stopping second you thought the wheel would pitch you out , headlong , over the town , to swim frantically , comically , in empty air until the ground roared up to meet you .
After a heart-stopping few minutes it was realized that it could be just squeezed through with about three-quarters of an inch to spare .
I had a heart-stopping sensation of falling , as if in a dream .
After a few heart-stopping moments the old engine coughed into life , and he managed to accelerate the loaded vehicle through the flames out to safety .
This was to emphasise that dreadful heart-stopping second or so before Creed pressed the shutter release without knowing whether or not the water had ruined his equipment .
He registered her silence after a heart-stopping minute , came out of his tunnel and looked at her .
He glanced quickly out of the window , needing to rest his eyes after the dazzling sight of such heart-stopping beauty .
She 'd never been driven that fast before , never experienced the sheer exhilaration and heart-stopping fear that merged into one as the F40 powered on the knife edge of its optimum limits .
She could do without the Romance and the Glamour , the heart-stopping uniform and the V.C .
He took a step towards her and for one heart-stopping moment she thought that he was going to kiss her , and then where would she and her collection of high-minded resolutions be ?
` Responding , " he answered , with a heart-stopping smile .
Her mouth was within an inch of his chin and they clung to one another for a heart-stopping moment , getting breath and balance back , before he thrust her aside .
For a second their glances leapt to meet each other , locking for a heart-stopping moment in a recognition that seemed more than merely superficial .
For one awful heart-stopping second she felt as if she was going to fall , here , now , right in front of high and mighty Luke â€¦
He threw her a direct , heart-stopping look .
Terrified that he would guess her wanton reaction to the heart-stopping touch of his hand , Isabel jerked her head away .
Because , it occurred to her with heart-stopping suddenness , the last thing in the world she wanted was to be around when Rohan Saint Yves married Antoinette -- or anyone else .
He held her -- just for one heart-stopping , breathtaking moment .
They slithered out with a slurping noise , and for a heart-stopping second it sounded as if Caroline had come back to life .
For one heart-stopping moment she closed her eyes , feeling quite faint at the extraordinary nervous thrill of excitement and apprehension spiralling through her body .
He lifted a hand and , touching her pale cheek with gentle fingers , gave her a heart-stopping smile .
